concept.title: Bulk operations
concept.shortdesc: You can perform bulk operations by using the various *Op structures along with the Do method of your Bucket object.

conbody.p: The *Op structures work by accepting the same parameters that are accepted by the individual methods. Following the execution of the Do method against the list of *Op structures, the remaining fields will be filled out with the results of the operations.
